achievement.__comment: Should trigger when the Inventory is opened for the first time

achievement.error.__comment: Should fail to parse because the 'id' property is missing

attack.entity.damage.__comment: Should trigger if the player deals at least 5 damage to any living entity

attack.entity.damage.error.__comment: Should fail to parse because "test" is not a number

attack.entity.sources.__comment: Should trigger only if the player shoots any living entity with an arrow

attack.entity.sources.error.__comment: Should fail to parse because 'sources' contains a null element

attack.entity.targets1.__comment: Should trigger only if the player is attacking a pig

attack.entity.targets1.error.__comment: Should fail to parse because 'targets' is not an array

attack.entity.targets2.__comment: Should trigger only if the player is attacking a cow or a sheep

attack.entity.targets2.error1.__comment: Should fail to parse because EntityItem is not a subclass of EntityLivingBase

attack.entity.targets2.error2.__comment: Should fail to parse because com.example.Class does not exist

block.break.__comment: Should trigger if the player breaks either normal or red sand

block.break.error.__comment: Should fail to parse because 'test' can not be found in the registry

block.place.__comment: Should trigger if the player places either normal or red sand

block.place.error.__comment: Should fail to parse because -1 is not a valid meta value

item.drop.__comment: Should trigger only if the player drops a diamond sword which was damaged exactly once

item.drop.wildcard.__comment: Should trigger if the player drops any diamond sword

item.drop.nbt.__comment: Should trigger only if the player drops a diamond sword with the given NBT (but any damage)

item.drop.nbt.error.__comment: Should fail to parse because ydflkjnykdlfjbngydfgkjlb is not valid NBT

dimension.join.id.__comment: Should trigger if the player enters the end dimension

dimension.join.provider.__comment: Should trigger if the player enters the nether dimension

dimension.join.error1.__comment: Should fail to parse because neither 'id' nor 'provider' is specified

dimension.join.error2.__comment: Should fail to parse because both 'id' and 'provider' are specified

lightning.__comment: Should trigger if the player is struck by lightning

enderpearl.__comment: Should trigger if the player teleports a distance of at least 5 blocks using an enderpearl
